item.description:
Savin Rock Roasting Company -Â an excellent restaurant and great neighborhood bar now is doing trivia on Tuesday nights, hosted by our NHC own DJ Paul C. Trivia starts at 9pm, but let's stake out a table at 8:30 - come join me!

Specials:
$2 Bud/lights
$3 Mixed Drinks
$4 House Wine

Reminder: We have a $25 gift card from our last win - so we can get 3-4 appetizers for free!

There's a parking lot next to the bar, or free street parking.

Teams can be up to 6 people - prizes for the top three teams!

I'll check the RSVP's on my way there so I know how much space to try to save - please let me know if you're a 'maybe' or if you change your mind about coming or not going at the last minute - no worries!

http://www.savinrockroasting.com/
item.name: Trivia Tuesday in West Haven!
